about_the_game:
Is it really an RPG without a desert somewhere? The trouble is, most deserts don’t have much in ’em. But don’t let that mean that your maps have to be boring and uninspiring. Our Untamed Desert tileset has plenty to give you choices. Your players won’t have to slog through an endless one-tile wasteland. Not on your watch.

This Desert Tileset Includes:

Ground tiles:

Water
3 colors of sand (yellow, gray and red/brown) with four coordinated textures to make paths, etc
2 wood flooring
fence and table
matching grasses
rock path and hole tiles
4 stair patterns, plus an assortment of other wood and metal panels

Wall tiles:

4 rock textures in the same colors as the sand
4 man-made stone walls
5 other wall textures

Cacti and plants:

multiple styles of cacti for variety
scrub grass
tumble weed
palm trees
dead trees

Town tiles:

Stairs and ladders
windows
animated doors
rickety fence
shelves and shelf objects
bedding
market supplies (stands, awnings, produce and baked goods)
crates, boxes and barrels
hanging laundry

Plus a collection of rocks for more variety!

You also get edge tiles and some shadow tiles to vary up your map appearance even more!

Animations:

Animated doors and four fire animations!


* UPDATE AUGUST 2024 *

- Improved autotile textures
- Standard tile art improvements
- A new animated oasis


Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
